pr_title: Fix replaced partitions validation in SnapshotManager

timeline.message: Fix replaced partitions validation in SnapshotManager.

timeline.bodyText: Dumb question here: is it safe for validateCurrentSnapshot to not check meta.currentSnapshot() != null in prior? If requiredCurrentSnapshotId is not null and meta.currentSnapshot() is null then NPE would occur, but I'm not sure the possibility about it.
timeline.author: HeartSaVioR

replies.bodyText: Looks like we should fix that one as well. I think you should be able to FF to any snapshot if there is no current snapshot. Thanks @HeartSaVioR!
replies.author: rdblue
